frontmatter.title: IBM Cloud Pak for Integration
frontmatter.description: An introduction to work I've done in the IBM Cloud Pak for Integration.

internal.content:
---
title: IBM Cloud Pak for Integration
description: An introduction to work I've done in the IBM Cloud Pak for Integration. 
---

<PageDescription>

The IBM Cloud Pak for Integration comprises IBM's integration products (Event Streams, MQ, App Connect, API Connect, Aspera and Data Power). 
The focus of the team is to streamline workflows of teams and businesses using multiple IBM integration technologies.

</PageDescription>

## Objectives

1. Allow and encourage users to explore and use integration technologies they've not used before.

1. Understand the way that software development teams are organised and are changing in industry.

1. Facilitate cooperation between IBM product teams to create a consistent user experience.

## Key experiences from IBM Cloud Pak for Integration:

**[Hello World design sprint](https://chloepoulterdesign.github.io/portfolio/IBMCP4I/HelloWorld)**
We applied the Design Sprint method into a forward-looking sprint on the Hello World experience of an Integration developer. 

**[Capability installation with OpenShift native Operators](https://chloepoulterdesign.github.io/portfolio/IBMCP4I/Operators)**
I have contributed to and documented a variety of patterns to carbon and to the CDAI design website.

<PageDescription>

The IBM Cloud Pak for Integration comprises IBM's integration products (Event Streams, MQ, App Connect, API Connect, Aspera and Data Power). 
The focus of the team is to streamline workflows of teams and businesses using multiple IBM integration technologies.

</PageDescription>

## Objectives

1. Allow and encourage users to explore and use integration technologies they've not used before.

1. Understand the way that software development teams are organised and are changing in industry.

1. Facilitate cooperation between IBM product teams to create a consistent user experience.

## Key experiences from IBM Cloud Pak for Integration:

**[Hello World design sprint](https://chloepoulterdesign.github.io/portfolio/IBMCP4I/HelloWorld)**
We applied the Design Sprint method into a forward-looking sprint on the Hello World experience of an Integration developer. 

**[Capability installation with OpenShift native Operators](https://chloepoulterdesign.github.io/portfolio/IBMCP4I/Operators)**
